user.title: SensorThings API Setup
user.description: Choose how you want to add your SensorThings API server:

discover.title: Discovering SensorThings devices
discover.description: Scanning your network for SensorThings API servers...

discover_no_devices.title: No devices found
discover_no_devices.description: No SensorThings API servers were found on your network. You can try discovery again, scan a different network range, or enter the URL manually.

custom_network.title: Custom Network Range
custom_network.description: Enter the network range to scan (e.g., {example}). The discovery will scan IPs from .1 to .50 in this range.

select_device.title: Select SensorThings device
select_device.description: Found {device_count} SensorThings device(s) on your network. Select the one you want to add:

manual.title: Enter SensorThings API URL
manual.description: Enter the URL of your SensorThings API server. Example: {example_url}

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the SensorThings API server. Please check the URL and try again.
error.no_devices_found: No SensorThings API servers were found on your network. Make sure the server is running and accessible.
error.network_required: Please enter a network range to scan.
error.invalid_network: Invalid network format. Please use format like 192.168.0, 192.168.1, etc.

abort.already_configured: This SensorThings API server is already configured.
